title: Portrait of Kitty
provenance_text:
Sir Jacob Epstein [1880-1959], London, England, until January 1959 [1]; purchased from the artist by Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), January 1959 until April 1, 1973 [2]; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was exhibited (no. 139) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Mr. Rosenbloom from the International for Â£500. The artist acknowledged payment on January 15, 1959.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
